actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the bases for ineligibility for designation of countries as beneficiary developing countries under title V of the Trade Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
short_title: Playing Fair on Trade and Innovation Act

titles.title: Playing Fair on Trade and Innovation Act
To amend the bases for ineligibility for designation of countries as beneficiary developing countries under title V of the Trade Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
